medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain started in the epigastrium yesterday at 6am and has migrated to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). The patient has a greater than 24 hours history of abdominal pain, which was quite severe at admission, accompanied by nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Anemia, chronic lower back pain; Previous surgeries include two cesarean sections.
